title: Pirate's Treasure
description: A map leads the player to a fabled pirate's treasure buried on a remote island, but they're not the only ones searching for it.
subquest: Gather clues from the old pirate captain's hidden diary.
Navigate through treacherous waters to reach the remote island.
Outsmart the rival pirate crew searching for the treasure.
Solve the intricate puzzles guarding the buried treasure's location.
Battle the fearsome sea monster guarding the final treasure chamber.
Escape the collapsing cave with the precious pirate's treasure.
